App
components.templateData:
Accordion Test - ng-content Mode

What is Flowbite?

Flowbite is an open-source library of interactive components built on top of Tailwind CSS including buttons, dropdowns, modals, navbars, and more.

Check out this guide to learn how to get started and start developing websites even faster with components on top of Tailwind CSS.

 Is there a Figma file available?

Flowbite is first conceptualized and designed using the Figma software so everything you see in the library has a design equivalent in our Figma file.

Check out the Figma design system based on the utility classes from Tailwind CSS and components from Flowbite.

 What are the differences?

The main difference is that the core components from Flowbite are open source under the MIT license, whereas Tailwind UI is a paid product.

  • Feature 1
  • Feature 2

variables.name: createLightDarkComparison
variables.defaultValue:
(componentTag: string, bindings = ''): string => `
Light Mode
<${componentTag} ${bindings} />
Dark Mode
<${componentTag} ${bindings} />
`
variables.rawdescription:
Helper utilities for Storybook stories
Creates consistent Light vs Dark mode comparisons
variables.description: Helper utilities for Storybook stories Creates consistent Light vs Dark mode comparisons

variables.name: createLightDarkRender
variables.rawdescription: Creates a standard render function for stories with Light/Dark comparison
variables.description: Creates a standard render function for stories with Light/Dark comparison

variables.name: createVariantComparison
variables.defaultValue:
( componentTag: string, variants: string[], baseBindings = '', ): string => `

Light Mode - All Variants

${variants .map( (variant) => `
${variant}
<${componentTag} [variant]="'${variant.toLowerCase()}'" ${baseBindings} />
`, ) .join('')}

Dark Mode - All Variants

${variants .map( (variant) => `
${variant}
<${componentTag} [variant]="'${variant.toLowerCase()}'" ${baseBindings} />
`, ) .join('')}
`
variables.rawdescription: Creates a template for comparing all variants in a 3x2 grid (Light + Dark)
variables.description: Creates a template for comparing all variants in a 3x2 grid (Light + Dark)

variables.name: generateBindings
variables.rawdescription: Helper to generate common Angular bindings string
variables.description: Helper to generate common Angular bindings string

variables.name: wrapInLightDarkComparison
variables.defaultValue:
(template: string): string => `
Light Mode
${template}
Dark Mode
${template}
`
variables.rawdescription:
Wraps any template in a Light/Dark comparison layout
Used for complex components with custom templates (like modals)
variables.description: Wraps any template in a Light/Dark comparison layout Used for complex components with custom templates (like modals)
